name: The Second Word: Crossword
summary:
The Second Word is a 2 in 1 crossword puzzle game with brain challenging hidden words . Use hints to solve the amazing word puzzle.Rearrange the jumbled words in order.
Given are the words at the centre of a board game. Your task is to find the second word or the letters hidden on either side of the words. Complete the word puzzle and advance to next level.
As of now your task is to find the 7 letter word. This game consist of 99 levels with endless game mode.If you like this game and support me I would make more word challenges just for you.
